        Φ network
            The Φ network system is based on P2P technology,i.e. decentralized network.
            The Φ network has no center, every nodes in the Φ network are equal. Users can communicate point-to-point, or broadcast and relay Φ information.
            Becuase of the cascade-spreading of Φ information in the Φ network, there're no way to block ,filter or modify Φ information,ensuring ultimate freedom;
            Also becuase of the cascade-spreading of Φ information in the Φ network,it's extremely difficult to track the origin of Φ information,ensuring ultimate anonymity.
            Any digital device can join the Φ network if it follows the basic Φ network protocol.All kinds of apps can be run on Φ network,even without a server.
        Φ database
            The Φ database system is based on blockchain technology.
            There's always only one valid version of Φ database in the whole internet, while many node/digital devices keep a full copy of it.
            Because every digital device in the Φ network can have a full copy of the Φ database, so it will never be deleted.
            Φ information following Φ database rules  will go into Φ database if confirmed by Φ miners. The Φ database rules strictly require digital signature from the sender for the Φ information, so no one else can modify the Φ information,i.e. the Φ information will be stored in the Φ database as what it was forever. Because of the decentrality of miners, there're no ways to block any valid Φ information going into Φ database ,ensuring ultimate freedom;
            Because everbody has exactly the same copy of Φ database, so there're no ways to know what data a user has browsed,ensuring ultimate anonymity.
            The Φ database is open for all kinds of information,not only text,image,vedio,but also programmes,settings,opeartion commands--nothing is impossible, oh ,impossible is nothing.
        Φ currency
           The Φ currency system is based on Bitcoin technology.
           The Φ currency is published and distributed independantly on Φ system. It has no relationship with traditional currencies, so it's indepent from all traditional banking and financial system.
           Any Φ account can receive and send Φ currency. Obviously , The Φ currency system inherits the freedom and anonymity of Φ account .
          A big unique advantage of Φ currency system is that, the currency transaction is processed together with information and operation commands on the Φ system, it's unimaginably easy for merchants or app developers to integrete currency functions into their programmes.
